welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bourg-la-Reine, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and quaint cafes. We invite you to immerse yourself in its rich culture and picturesque surroundings, and we hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Le Bourget Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Comprised of seven sub-terminals, Terminal 2 serves a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
